user_prompt: create epics and user stories for the use case

epics.title: Requirement Analysis and Project Planning
epics.summary: Initiate project planning and gather business requirements
epics.description: This epic focuses on understanding the use case, establishing objectives, identifying stakeholders, and defining measurable success criteria. It includes gathering functional and non-functional requirements, identifying constraints, and documenting all necessary project details to form the baseline for future development phases.

epics.title: System Architecture and Design Setup
epics.summary: Develop high-level system architecture and design components
epics.description: This epic involves designing the solution architecture, selecting the appropriate technology stack, and defining database structures and integration points. It also includes creating UI/UX design mockups and defining user flow diagrams to ensure a seamless and scalable system design.

epics.title: Core Feature Development
epics.summary: Implement main functionalities based on core use case
epics.description: This epic covers the development of primary functionalities that fulfill the core objectives of the use case. It includes building backend APIs, integrating front-end interfaces, and ensuring smooth data communication between system components. The goal is to achieve a Minimum Viable Product (MVP) with stable functionality.

epics.title: User Authentication and Role Management
epics.summary: Provide secure login, registration, and access control
epics.description: This epic includes implementing user account management with secure authentication workflows, password encryption, and session handling. It also includes defining user roles and permissions to restrict or allow access to different features based on user privileges.

epics.title: Advanced Features and External Integrations
epics.summary: Enhance the system with advanced features and external service integration
epics.description: This epic focuses on developing advanced features such as reporting dashboards, notifications, analytics, and integration with external systems (e.g., payment gateways, third-party APIs). It’s aimed at improving the overall user experience and broadening the platform’s functionality.

epics.title: Testing and Quality Assurance
epics.summary: Ensure the system meets performance and reliability standards
epics.description: This epic involves comprehensive testing practices, including unit testing, integration testing, user acceptance testing, and performance validation. It also includes identifying and fixing bugs, confirming feature behavior alignment with requirements, and ensuring high system reliability before deployment.

epics.title: Deployment and Monitoring
epics.summary: Deploy the application and implement monitoring systems
epics.description: This epic includes application deployment to production environments, setting up CI/CD pipelines, and configuring automated deployment processes. It also encompasses performance monitoring, error tracking, and system logging to guarantee continuous system health and reliability.

epics.title: User Feedback and Product Enhancement
epics.summary: Collect user feedback and enhance the product iteratively
epics.description: This epic is dedicated to collecting user feedback post-deployment and enhancing product features accordingly. It ensures the system evolves to meet user expectations, fix usability issues, and introduce new capabilities based on market and user insights.
